channel.title: Adding NPCs-Need help
channel.description:
Ok, i added shop keeper 524, and when i trade him is get disconnected, and then recconect. :confused:
Plz help.
-God Swift [br][size=1]Posted at: December 06, 2006, 07:33:34 AM[/size][hr]also i have an error when i tryed to add green dragons.Help plz
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1353) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:28) at server.main(server.java:28)

item.title: Adding NPCs-Need help
item.dc:creator: @Jump_On_Java Jump On Java
item.description:
@Jump_On_Java wrote:

[b]Did You Add It To The Shops.Cfg ?
Did You Add It To Client.Java ?

Thanks,

-Jump On Java[/b]

item.title: Adding NPCs-Need help
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

It has to be able to trade and not just talk also…and what i told you to do should have worked cause that’s what tell’s them what shop to open.

item.title: Adding NPCs-Need help
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Afro56 Darth_Afro56
item.description:
@Darth_Afro56 wrote:

Did you rmember to add him to Shop.cfg?

And remember make sure the Npc isnt already in use.

item.title: Adding NPCs-Need help
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Go to your client and search for

Aubury rune shop

and you should see soemthing like this

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true;

Under it put

} else if (NPCID == 524) { //name of Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //shopkeeper

And just change the 44 to your shop number and save and compile.

Read full topic
